tagline: Modernized wordpress magazeen theme to support new wordpress features
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Wp-magazeen-modern
body:
Updated Magazeen Theme for wordpress to support following features
* Wordpress Menu
* Header Image
* Ad box instead of search button in the header

The original theme can be found here http://www.smashingmagazine.com/2009/02/23/magazeen-free-magazine-look-wordpress-theme/
